mapper.select: select STUNO,NAME,substr(id,1,length(id)-3) || '***' as ID,GRADE,SUBSTR(JUMIN,1,6) || '-' || SUBSTR(JUMIN,7,1) || '******' AS JUMIN FROM STU

SELECT stuNo,S.NAME AS NAME , D1.DNAME AS DDName , D.DNAME AS d2DName ,P.NAME AS pName FROM STU S INNER JOIN PROFESSOR P ON S.PROFNO = P.PROFNO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON P.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D1 ON D.PART = D1.DEPTNO WHERE stuNo = #{stuNo}
